commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Bas0b8ad38"

diff:
"0b8ad38 Bug 397048 - static builds need msimg32 after cairo update, r=vlad, a=mconnor
diff --git a/browser/app/Makefile.in b/browser/app/Makefile.in
index 78fdb13..5874e06 100644
--- a/browser/app/Makefile.in
+++ b/browser/app/Makefile.in
@@ -176,7 +176,7 @@ endif
 ifeq ($(OS_ARCH),WINNT)
 OS_LIBS += $(call EXPAND_LIBNAME,comctl32 comdlg32 uuid shell32 ole32 oleaut32 version winspool)
 ifdef MOZ_ENABLE_CAIRO_GFX
-OS_LIBS += $(call EXPAND_LIBNAME,usp10)
+OS_LIBS += $(call EXPAND_LIBNAME,usp10 msimg32)
 ifdef MOZ_ENABLE_GLITZ
 OS_LIBS += $(call EXPAND_LIBNAME,opengl32)
 endif
"
